verses.verse: And it came to pass the same <S%H8141>year<s%>, in the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of the <S%H4467>reign<s%> of <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, and in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, that <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5809>Azur<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, which was of <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%>, <S%H559>spoke<s%> unto me in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, in the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and of all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thus <S%H559>speaks<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, I have <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

Inside two <S%H3117>full<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> will I bring <S%H7725>again<s%> into this <S%H4725>place<s%> all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, that <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> took <S%H3947>away<s%> from this <S%H4725>place<s%>, and <S%H935>carried<s%> them to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>:

And I will bring <S%H7725>again<s%> to this <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H3204>Jeconiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, with all the <S%H1546>captives<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, that <S%H935>went<s%> into <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: for I will <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

Then the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> in the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and in the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>,

Even the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H543>Amen<s%>: the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3068>so<s%>: the Lord <S%H6965>perform<s%> your <S%H1697>words<s%> which you have <S%H5012>prophesied<s%>, to bring <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, and all that is carried away <S%H1473>captive<s%>, from <S%H894>Babylon<s%> into this <S%H4725>place<s%>.
Nevertheless <S%H8085>hear<s%> you now this <S%H1697>word<s%> that I <S%H1696>speak<s%> in your <S%H241>ears<s%>, and in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of all the <S%H5971>people<s%>;

The <S%H5030>prophets<s%> that have been <S%H6440>before<s%> me and <S%H6440>before<s%> you of <S%H5769>old<s%> <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> both against <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H776>countries<s%>, and against <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%>, of <S%H4421>war<s%>, and of <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and of <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>.

The <S%H5030>prophet<s%> which <S%H5012>prophesies<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%>, when the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> shall come to <S%H935>pass<s%>, <S%H227>then<s%> shall the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> be <S%H3045>known<s%>, that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H571>truly<s%> sent <S%H7971>him<s%>.
Then <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H4133>yoke<s%> from off the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>'s <S%H6677>neck<s%>, and broke <S%H7665>it<s%>.

And <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> in the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; Even so will I <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> from the <S%H6677>neck<s%> of all <S%H1471>nations<s%> inside the space of two <S%H3117>full<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>. And the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%>.

Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H310>prophet<s%>, after that <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> had <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H4133>yoke<s%> from off the <S%H6677>neck<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1980>Go<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; You have <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H4133>yokes<s%> of <S%H6086>wood<s%>; but you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> for them <S%H4133>yokes<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; I have <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%> upon the <S%H6677>neck<s%> of all these <S%H1471>nations<s%>, that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>; and they shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H5414>him<s%>: and I have given him the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the field <S%H7704>also<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> unto <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H2608>now<s%>, Hananiah; The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has not <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5971>you<s%>; but you make this people to <S%H982>trust<s%> in a <S%H8267>lie<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; <S%H7971>Behold<s%>, I will cast you from off the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>: this <S%H8141>year<s%> you shall <S%H4191>die<s%>, because you have <S%H1696>taught<s%> <S%H5627>rebellion<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
So <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> the same <S%H8141>year<s%> in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>.
